title: Banner Grabbing
description:
You connect to a service using netcat and receive this banner:

$ nc 192.168.1.10 22
SSH-2.0-OpenSSH_8.9p1 Ubuntu-3ubuntu0.4

$ nc 192.168.1.10 25
220 mail.target.com ESMTP Postfix (Ubuntu)

$ nc 192.168.1.10 80
(no banner, but response headers show: Server: nginx/1.18.0)

What operating system is the target most likely running, based on all three banners?

Submit as: flag{os_name} (lowercase)
hints: Look for OS identifiers in the service banners
SSH banner says 'Ubuntu', SMTP says 'Ubuntu', nginx version matches Ubuntu repos
All three services consistently identify the OS
